data.text:
This girl's particularly hard to please. 
Total opposite of you, eh? Tray-chan.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>This girl's particularly hard to please. 
<story>Total opposite of you, eh? Tray-chan.

data.text: We're watching videos of some girls racing, that Transcend filmed. She's adding extra info that I couldn't grasp just from seeing them run.
data.processed: We're watching videos of some girls racing, that Transcend filmed. She's adding extra info that I couldn't grasp just from seeing them run.

data.text:
What do you think of their running styles? 
Anything caught you eye?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>What do you think of their running styles? 
<story>Anything caught you eye?

data.text: She restarts the race footage.
data.processed: <story>She restarts the race footage.

data.text:
They all seem to have mastered the fundamentals. 
Their starts are good, too. No problems there.
data.processed:
<story>They all seem to have mastered the fundamentals. 
<story>Their starts are good, too. No problems there.

data.text:
I agree. Then, it's gonna come down to 
their personalities, eh?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>I agree. Then, it's gonna come down to 
<story>their personalities, eh?

data.text: Something's missing and I can't put my finger on it....
data.processed: <story>Something's missing and I can't put my finger on it....

data.text: Transcend has shown me a lot of different girls, but none of them made me think "This is the one!"
data.processed: Transcend has shown me a lot of different girls, but none of them made me think "This is the one!"

data.text:
Of course, they're all fantastic and show a great display of skill 
in running. Yet... None of them have that "something..."
data.processed:
<story>Of course, they're all fantastic and show a great display of skill 
<story>in running. Yet... None of them have that "something..."

data.text: I don't get it. I guess it's a me problem then... I better find out what it is—
data.processed: I don't get it. I guess it's a me problem then... I better find out what it is—

data.text:
Oh, here's Wonder Acute! 
They're about to start, so pay attention!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Oh, here's Wonder Acute! 
<story>They're about to start, so pay attention!

data.text:
Wah, Acute is here, too? She's been doing really well... 
And with all those trainers looking... I'm so nervous...
data.name: Umamusume A
data.processed:
<story>Wah, Acute is here, too? She's been doing really well... 
<story>And with all those trainers looking... I'm so nervous...

data.text:
Maybe it's better not to aim for first... It might end poorly. 
I want to be in the top 5 at least, that's easier.
data.name: Umamusume B
data.processed:
<story>Maybe it's better not to aim for first... It might end poorly. 
<story>I want to be in the top 5 at least, that's easier.

data.text:
Giving it your all and then falling off at the end would be painful. 
—In the midst of watching these girls discuss their strategies, 
a thought appeared in my mind.
data.processed:
<story>Giving it your all and then falling off at the end would be painful. 
<story>—In the midst of watching these girls discuss their strategies, 
<story>a thought appeared in my mind.

data.text: Wha... Me?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>Wha... Me?

data.text:
Hmm... Well, I think I shouldn't just be running 
for the sake of showing off... I guess?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Hmm... Well, I think I shouldn't just be running 
<story>for the sake of showing off... I guess?

data.text:
The point of racing is to beat the others. 
You should be running to the point you might stumble.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>The point of racing is to beat the others. 
<story>You should be running to the point you might stumble.

data.text:
Ahaha, not like I'd actually. But really though, if you run 
safely because you want to look nice... It'd be a bit—
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Ahaha, not like I'd actually. But really though, if you run 
<story>safely because you want to look nice... It'd be a bit—

data.text:
It seems like my words connected with her. 
I startled her for a bit, but then she smiled back.
data.processed:
<story>It seems like my words connected with her. 
<story>I startled her for a bit, but then she smiled back.

data.text: ... Yes, exactly. It'd be boring.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>... Yes, exactly. It'd be boring.

data.text:
Just aiming for top 5 isn't enough. 
Even going for first...
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Just aiming for top 5 isn't enough. 
<story>Even going for first...

data.text: I want something more...
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>I want something more...

data.text: I want to feel the thrill of running.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>I want to feel the thrill of running.

data.text: Whaaaaaaaa!!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>Whaaaaaaaa!!

data.text:
Geh! Hah... Nguh...! 
Hah... Hah... Come on!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Geh! Hah... Nguh...! 
<story>Hah... Hah... Come on!

data.text:
Hah, hah...! 
Gotta exceed... expectations!!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Hah, hah...! 
<story>Gotta exceed... expectations!!

data.text: Kuuuuh!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>Kuuuuh!

data.text:
—This was supposed to be a mere stroll at dusk. 
When I got to the vantage point, I heard her shout 
like I hadn't heard before. A chill went down my spine.
data.processed:
<story>—This was supposed to be a mere stroll at dusk. 
<story>When I got to the vantage point, I heard her shout 
<story>like I hadn't heard before. A chill went down my spine.

data.text:
Worried sick, I looked for her. 
When I found her, she was covered in sweat 
and barely able to stand up straight.
data.processed:
<story>Worried sick, I looked for her. 
<story>When I found her, she was covered in sweat 
<story>and barely able to stand up straight.

data.text:
Yeah, sorry about just now. Did I worry you? 
Thanks for keeping an eye out for me.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, sorry about just now. Did I worry you? 
<story>Thanks for keeping an eye out for me.

data.text:
She's smiling at me as if nothing happened. 
As if she had merely pulled my leg.
data.processed:
<story>She's smiling at me as if nothing happened. 
<story>As if she had merely pulled my leg.

data.text:
Hmm? You seem worried. 
What's the matter?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Hmm? You seem worried. 
<story>What's the matter?

data.text:
Back then...? Ah... You heard me? 
Actually, it's my bad for screaming.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Back then...? Ah... You heard me? 
<story>Actually, it's my bad for screaming.

data.text:
I'm sooo embarrased. You could've pretended 
you didn't hear anything, Tray-chan.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>I'm sooo embarrased. You could've pretended 
<story>you didn't hear anything, Tray-chan.

data.text:
I think she wanted me to hear it on purpose. 
As to make me understand how she feels.
data.processed:
<story>I think she wanted me to hear it on purpose. 
<story>As to make me understand how she feels.

data.text:
... Perhaps so. 
I just wish she'd put it into words.
data.processed:
<story>... Perhaps so. 
<story>I just wish she'd put it into words.

data.text:
I wonder if this relates at all to why 
I wasn't able to make my choice...
data.processed:
<story>I wonder if this relates at all to why 
<story>I wasn't able to make my choice...

data.text: Tray-chan?
data.name: Transcend

choices.text: You want to... exceed all expectations?

data.processed: <story>Tray-chan?

data.text: I just want to enjoy it, y'know.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>I just want to enjoy it, y'know.

data.text:
There's only so far you can stretch expectations. 
For especially for running, there are limits.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>There's only so far you can stretch expectations. 
<story>For especially for running, there are limits.

data.text:
But... When I race, I feel like I could break free from all that. 
Just having rivals around lets me go further!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>But... When I race, I feel like I could break free from all that. 
<story>Just having rivals around lets me go further!

data.text: Isn't that hella exciting?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>Isn't that hella exciting?

data.text:
Her words hit me hard. Hard enough to dislodge the words 
that had been stuck at the back of my throat...

choices.text: Just setting expectations alone isn't enough.

data.processed:
<story>Her words hit me hard. Hard enough to dislodge the words 
<story>that had been stuck at the back of my throat...

data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>...!

data.text:
Exceeding all expectations, all imagination... 
We both long for a race more thrilling than any other.
data.processed:
<story>Exceeding all expectations, all imagination... 
<story>We both long for a race more thrilling than any other.

data.text:
Yes, exactly. 
The best race, exceeding anything anyone 
could ever imagine.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Yes, exactly. 
<story>The best race, exceeding anything anyone 
<story>could ever imagine.

data.text: Isn't it thrilling?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>Isn't it thrilling?
